languages.text: "Не открывается! Проклятые еретики заблокировали дверь, дрожа от мысли о нашем приближении!"
"It won't open! The damned heretics have blocked the door, trembling at the thought of our approach!"
languages.original_text: "Не открывается! Проклятые еретики заблокировали дверь, дрожа от мысли о нашем приближении!"

traits.locale_text: "It won't open! The damned heretics have blocked the door, trembling at the thought of our approach!"
"It won't open! The damned heretics have blocked the door, trembling at the thought of our approach!"
"It won't open! The damned heretics have blocked the door, trembling at the thought of our approach!"
"It won't open! The damned heretics have blocked the door, trembling at the thought of our approach!"

languages.text: “这扇门打不开！那群该死的异端分子害怕我们冲进来，吓得把门给堵上了！”
languages.original_text: "It won't open! The damned heretics have blocked the door, trembling at the thought of our approach!"

traits.locale_text: “这扇门打不开！那群该死的异端分子害怕我们冲进来，吓得把门给堵上了！”

languages.text: « Ça ne s'ouvre pas ! Ces maudits hérétiques ont bloqué la porte, probablement terrifiés à l'idée de notre approche ! »
languages.original_text: "It won't open! The damned heretics have blocked the door, trembling at the thought of our approach!"

traits.locale_text: « Ça ne s'ouvre pas ! Ces maudits hérétiques ont bloqué la porte, probablement terrifiés à l'idée de notre approche ! »

languages.text: «¡No se abre! ¡Esos condenados herejes han bloqueado la puerta, aterrados por nuestra inminente llegada!».
languages.original_text: "It won't open! The damned heretics have blocked the door, trembling at the thought of our approach!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No se abre! ¡Esos condenados herejes han bloqueado la puerta, aterrados por nuestra inminente llegada!».

languages.text: 「開かない！忌々しい異端者たちがドアを塞ぎ、私たちが近付いてくるのを想像して怯えているんだわ！」
languages.original_text: "It won't open! The damned heretics have blocked the door, trembling at the thought of our approach!"

traits.locale_text: 「開かない！忌々しい異端者たちがドアを塞ぎ、私たちが近付いてくるのを想像して怯えているんだわ！」

languages.text: "Sie geht nicht auf! Die verfluchten Ketzer haben die Tür blockiert, solche Angst hatten sie vor unserem Kommen!"
languages.original_text: "It won't open! The damned heretics have blocked the door, trembling at the thought of our approach!"

traits.locale_text: "Sie geht nicht auf! Die verfluchten Ketzer haben die Tür blockiert, solche Angst hatten sie vor unserem Kommen!"

languages.original_text: "It won't open! The damned heretics have blocked the door, trembling at the thought of our approach!"

languages.text: "Açılmıyor! Adi kâfirler kapıyı kurcalamış olmalı, bizden ödleri kopuyor!"
languages.original_text: "It won't open! The damned heretics have blocked the door, trembling at the thought of our approach!"

traits.locale_text: "Açılmıyor! Adi kâfirler kapıyı kurcalamış olmalı, bizden ödleri kopuyor!"
